title: What is the best headphones I can wear while I'm outside, which I can get for $150 - $200, (I'm listening to house and post-rock music)? - Quora

response.answer_text: These are some of the best options available for you: Sennheiser HD 598 Special Edition Over-Ear Headphones - BlackBose SoundTrue around-ear headphones II - Apple devices, CharcoalAudio-Technica ATH-SR5BTBK Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear High-Resolution Audio Headphones, BlackSennheiser Bluetooth wireless Headphone , (HD 4.40 BT)Skullcandy Crusher Wireless Bluetooth Over-Ear Headphone with Mic - Black

Check out Senheiser HD-201 and HD-202, they are $20 headphones with amazing sound quality. Construction is a bit on the cheap side, but those are most bang for the buck earphones I have encountered. Do not expect strong basses, they are not Beats, but do expect amazing sound quality (better then Beats), and realistic sound.  You can get 9 pairs for $150.
